name: The lunatics
about: Great music inspired by early electronic sounds, combining the symphony of classical instruments and complete surrounding

type.00:15: I miss you, where are you hiding? Miss you, your soul’s not lighting up now I miss you and the hope once shining through you

type.00:31: Did someone hurt you? Did you give into bribery? Did fear wrap around you Did power strong-arm liberty?

type.00:45: I would forgive you if you would be the change again And I could support you if freedom rang aloud again

type.01:00: You’re missing(x2) where men with courage stand Somehow you’re missing(x2) will you listen now?

type.01:16: I miss you overturning exec Misuse of commander and chief signature But now you’re doling out the dollars

type.01:25: But I would forgive you if you would be the change again And I could support you if freedom rang aloud again

type.01:53: You’re missing(x2) where men with courage stand Somehow you’re missing(x2) will you listen now? Will you listen now?(x2)

type.02:08: I”m afraid to fly where nothing’s sacred Afraid to trust this House of Bankers Made a lie of justice is she blind? Well, I’m in terror now

type.02:26: Did someone hurt you? Did you give into bribery? Did fear wrap around you? Did power strong-arm liberty?

type.02:41: I would forgive you if you would be the change again And I could support you if freedom rang aloud again
